key.name: shutdown-max-timer-value
key.description: Set maximum selectable shutdown time of the slider (in minutes). Use only values greater zero.

key.name: wake-max-timer-value
key.description: Set maximum selectable wake time of the slider (in minutes). Use only values greater zero.

key.name: auto-wake-value
key.summary: Automatically start and stop wake on shutdown timer toggle
key.description: Enable/Disable the wake alarm when the shutdown timer is started/stopped.

key.name: shutdown-timestamp-value
key.description: Unix time in seconds of scheduled shutdown or -1 if disabled.

key.name: wake-slider-value
key.description: Set wake slider position as percent of the maximum time. Must be in range 0 and 100.

key.name: shutdown-slider-value
key.description: Set shutdown slider position as percent of the maximum time. Must be in range 0 and 100.

key.name: show-wake-items-value
key.description: Show/hide all wake items in widget.

key.name: show-textboxes-value
key.description: Show/hide notification text boxes on screen.

key.name: root-mode-value
key.description: Set root mode on/off. In root mode powering off is done via 'pkexec' and 'shutdown' terminal command.

key.name: show-shutdown-mode-value
key.description: Comma-separated shutdown modes which are shown in the popup menu.

key.name: shutdown-mode-value
key.description: Mode to use for shutdown command.

key.name: check-command-value
key.description: Run command before shutdown command. Proceed with shutdown only if check command succeedes.

key.name: enable-root-mode-cancel-value
key.description: Cancel the root mode protection before check command is run if enabled.

key.name: enable-check-command-value
key.description: Check command is skipped if disabled.
